title: My IRA Is Losing Money… Should I Pull Out? (Hour 2)
description:
Rachel Cruze & Ken Coleman discuss:

Dealing with the emotions of a down market,

Providing as a single mom,

The finances behind being a stay-at-home mom,

Pausing investing to do home repairs.


Support Our Sponsor:

PODS Moving & Storage

LegacyBox


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
